pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, February 10, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Addis Ababa, Ethiopia   

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a high level breakfast dialogue on sustaining peace and economic security in Africa.

Regency Ballroom 2, Ground Floor
Hyatt Regency Addis Ababa

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

9:35 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of Burkina Faso, Roch Marc Christian Kaboré.

Meeting Room 2, Ground Floor
Hyatt Regency Addis Ababa

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity at the beginning of the meeting

11:45 a.m. The Prime Minister will depart for Kuwait City, Kuwait.

Addis Ababa Bole International Airport

Note for media:

  • Closed to media

 3:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will arrive in Kuwait City, Kuwait.

Kuwait International Airport

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

4:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit members of the Canadian Armed Forces.

Camp Canada
Ali Al Salem Air Base

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

 7:05 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Prime Minister of Kuwait, Sheikh Sabah Khalid Al-Hamad Al-Sabah.

Prime Minister’s Office
Bayan Palace

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

7:40 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a working dinner given by the Prime Minister of Kuwait, Sheikh Sabah Khalid Al-Hamad Al-Sabah.

Prime Minister’s Office
Bayan Palace

Note for media:

  • Closed to media
